room_title: Escape room "The Sword of Zorro" by Mystery Escape Room in Salt Lake City
room_address: 130 S Rio Grande Street Salt Lake City, UT 84101
room_description: Zorro has hidden his sword in an old hacienda waiting for the time when it will be needed again. To ensure that it is kept safe and only those worthy of the sword can find it, Zorro created a test. The players must find Zorro’s hidden training room and pass his test to obtain the sword, but it won’t be easy. Zorro placed a time limit on the test, and those who don't succeed in time may find it to be deadly.
